title: SciFi Game Audio Complete
description: A complete collection of sounds for your Sci Fi Game
longDescription:
Introducing SciFi Game Audio Complete: The perfect sound pack to kickstart your SciFi Video Game/Film. This pack contains all of the essential sounds you can expect in a Sci Fi Game. .


SFX Sample: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ktk3K_UtJw4

Music Sample: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IWQbB7bPe6M


The pack is broken into 6 categories.


Player Character SFX: Female/Male voice acting, footsteps and other sfx such as a low hp heartbeat and shield sfx.


Environmental SFX: The pack contains 3 environmental layers. A city/spaceship/lab. Each layer also has one shot sfx to build upon the realism and immersion of the environment.


Enemies: From robots to bug aliens the enemy sfx will quickly bring life to common sci fi foes.


Weapons: Lasers, rocket launchers, spaceships oh my!


Misc./UI: All of the UI sounds you need plus some useful miscellaneous sounds such as clanks, rumbles, and ship sfx.


Music: 5 Tracks consisting of music for the main menu, exploration, combat, victory, and defeat.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  100 SFX of various key categories for a video game
  •  5 Music tracks of various categories


Number of Audio Waves: 117

Number of Audio Cues: 117

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Minutes of audio provided: 16:30

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
